attributes.comment: On behalf of the Healthcare Information and Management Systems Society (HIMSS), we are pleased to provide comments in response to your Request for Information on the National Directory of Healthcare Providers & Services (NDH).  HIMSS appreciates the opportunity to leverage our members’ expertise to share feedback on this critical topic, and we look forward to continued dialogue with you and your team on creating a centralized data hub for healthcare provider, facility, and entity directory information nationwide.
